sentences.en: All the hangings of the court round about were of fine twined linen.
sentences.cn: 院子四面的帷子都是用捻的细麻作的.

sentences.en: B: I'm phoning about your new range of wall hangings.
sentences.cn: 我想问问你们最新墙壁挂钩的一些产品信息.

sentences.en: Gold hangings were used to show off the pictures.
sentences.cn: 金色的吊帘被用来突出那些图片.

sentences.en: Hangings took place outside the prison as a public spectacle.
sentences.cn: 在监狱外执行绞刑是为了示众.

sentences.en: He picked up a pair of scissors, cut away half of one of the hangings.
sentences.cn: 他拿起一把剪子, 把其中一幅窗帘的一半剪了下来.

sentences.en: He ripped away the faded hangings from a wall.
sentences.cn: 他扯下墙上褪色的帘布.

sentences.en: He ripped away the faded hangings from the wall.
sentences.cn: 他把墙上的退色帘帷扯了下来.

sentences.en: It had an old paper and different hangings.
sentences.cn: 以前墙纸是旧的,窗帘也不同.

sentences.en: Mr. Sahin makes ceramic dishes and wall hangings.
sentences.cn: 他是制作陶器和墙幔的工匠.

sentences.en: Our main products including 100 % hand - painted paintings, printing canvas, framed art and fabric wall hangings.
sentences.cn: 我们的主要产品包括100%手画的绘画, 印刷画布, 框艺术与织物壁挂.

sentences.en: Tassels and Trimmings, Pillows, Wall Hangings, Table Runners, Bell.
sentences.cn: 采购产品垂饰, 枕头, 壁挂, 表亚军, 钟.

sentences.en: The cold castle walls were covered with hangings.
sentences.cn: 冰冷的城堡墙壁上覆盖着帘帷.

sentences.en: The windows were draped with costly hangings.
sentences.cn: 窗上全挂着贵重的窗帘.

sentences.en: There were two hangings here today.
They were done in chocolate and dark red, with rugs and hangings to match.
sentences.cn: 房间都漆成巧克力色和深红色, 配有相称的地毯和窗帘.

words.tran_cn: 门帘；脚手架；帘布（hanging的复数）

phrases.tran_cn: 空中花园（古巴比伦王国的世界七大奇观之一）

trans.tran_cn: 绞死( hanging的名词复数 )，绞刑，（墙上装饰用的）帘子，帷幔
